t: Ecovent EV410W Smart Wall Vent, 4x10 - Amazon.com
s: We found Ecovent, and about $2,300 later, every room was its own zone. Unfortunately, the vents don’t work as advertised. First of all, the vents are designed to open whenever there’s too much pressure.
